txt.en: 'Thurindol has spoken to me about the foes gathered within the towers of Carchost and Narchost. He believes some Black Númenóreans dwell there, and that some of them are perhaps sorcerers. I have seen their ilk, and know they are well beyond dangerous when armed and fully prepared. Let us strike at them whilst they are neither of these things, [placeholder].'
Candúr believes there are Black Númenórean sorcerers gathering within the Towers of the Teeth.
Black Númenórean sorcerers can be found within the Towers of the Teeth.\n\nYou should defeat Black Númenórean sorcerers.
'With the Black Númenóreans in the Towers defeated, we may just yet stand a chance. Yet still, peril is all around us.'
You should return to Candúr, who can be found at a small Ranger outpost hidden in the Slag-hills.
